Method Summary
 YouScopeServer login(java.lang.String password)

Method Detail

login

YouScopeServer login(java.lang.String password)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                            java.lang.SecurityException
When the right password is provided, this interface grants access to the microscope.

Parameters:
password - The password. Should be the same as the one set in the startup of the server.
Returns:
Main interface of the microscope.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
java.lang.SecurityException - Thrown if authentification failed.
